items.sentence: I don\'t have the courage to ask my boss to lend me his car.
I don\'t want you knocking on my door at two in the morning.
I wish that more people would take time to properly recycle.
Tom didn\'t bring the matter up at the meeting this morning.
Tom ate a turkey sandwich and drank a glass of orange juice.
I think the first thing you might want to do is talk to Tom.
I think you should let Tom and me go to Boston by ourselves.
Tom didn\'t say whether he would go to Mary\'s party or not.
Tom said Mary would help him, but I didn\'t think she would.
I had my headphones on so I didn\'t hear Tom enter the room.
